New Records: Harry Kane became the 10th men's player to reach 100 caps for England
Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored two goals, one in the 57th minute and another 14 minutes from the end, to secure a 2-0 win for England over Finland
Pre-Game Insights: Harry Kane was presented with a golden cap by fellow England centurions Frank Lampard and Ashley Cole in a special ceremony before kick-off at Wembley
Post-Match Reflections: Harry Kane described his 100th cap for England as a 'pretty much perfect' night after scoring both goals in the 2-0 win over Finland
Miscellaneous Highlights: England have started interim boss Lee Carsley's reign with two wins from their opening two Nations League matches
Others: Harry Kane is England's all-time top scorer with 68 goals during a career in which he has started 87 games and been named captain on 73 occasions
